lemma rreq_nsqn_is_fresh [simp]: fixes \<sigma> msg hops rreqid dip dsn dsk oip osn sip handled assumes "rreq_rrep_fresh (rt (\<sigma> sip)) (Rreq hops rreqid dip dsn dsk oip osn sip handled)" and "rreq_rrep_sn (Rreq hops rreqid dip dsn dsk oip osn sip handled)" shows "msg_fresh \<sigma> (Rreq hops rreqid dip dsn dsk oip osn sip handled)" (is "msg_fresh \<sigma> ?msg")
